item.description:
Join Us for the 2nd Annual Connecticut Wine Festival
The Connecticut Wine Festival will take place July 31 & August 1 at Goshen Fairgrounds.
Enjoy wine, food samples, live music, and buy great CT Wines by the bottle to take home!
Hours are Saturday, July 31, 12pm-7pm and Sunday, August 1, 12pm-6pm.
Bring your passport! There is an exclusive Connecticut Wine Festival stamp for the festival.
You must present your ID upon entering the festival.
No outside food or drinks allowed. No pets allowed.
Tickets purchased at the festival are $25 daily/$40 weekend, $10 designated drivers and under 21.
Advanced tickets will be available for purchase beginning Monday, May 10th
Ticket Prices are $20 daily/$40 weekend, and $10 for designated drivers/under 21.
Purchase tickets by calling 860.677.5467 between the hours of 9:00a.m. and 3:00p.m. Monday through Friday. Phone orders accepted until July 23, 2010.
Tickets will also be for sale at many local wineries. Check back soon for a list of where they will be available.
If you are interested in being a food, artisan, or craft vendor please contact Kristin Manning at manning@feralcreative.com.
If you are interested in volunteering at the event, contact Ginger Kunkle at ginger@ctfoodassociation.org.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up sign at the gate

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: "Connecticut Wine Festival"
